title: Mitchell's Modern Pantry
description: Bulk food shop with cafe. Stocks a variety of dried legumes, flours, dried fruit, seeds, fermented food and specialty ingredients not in the supermarket like cacao and nutritional yeast. Self serve - pay by weight. Has a vegan cake/biscuit/slice option. Cake served with coconut cream or you can take away. Wide variety of vegan milks. Owner/operator will order in vegan cake/biscuit etc if requested. Sometimes also has cashew cheese and other specialty produce.
